name: Sky Ranger
description:
Game made for #ZostanWDomuRobGry game jam.

World almost died off after devastating war. Only two empires survived - for them the fight is not yet over. Blinded by hatred they participate in the arms race in order to rebuild their weapons of mass destruction.

The victims of war, few survivors, try to rebuild their homes. Your role is to help them.

You are the Sky Ranger. The pilot of the ancient hi-tech airship and your task is to fly over the world and disrupt the two empires' warfare long enough for the civilization to reach the level of safety.
